text: @realDonaldTrump What is “ashame” is YOU allowing 125 THOUSAND PEOPLE to die of  covid-19 because you were more worried about VOTES. What is “ashame” is YOU using the Constitutional right of the people to protest as a distraction from your FAILURE as a president.
